Package io.opentelemetry.metrics

Interface Metric.Builder<B extends Metric.Builder<B,V>,V>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CounterDouble.Builder, CounterLong.Builder, GaugeDouble.Builder, GaugeLong.Builder
    Enclosing interface:
    Metric<T>
    public static interface Metric.Builder<B extends Metric.Builder<B,V>,V>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      V build()
      Builds and returns a metric with the desired options.
      B setConstantLabels​(Map<LabelKey,LabelValue> constantLabels)
      Sets the map of constant labels (they will be added to all the TimeSeries) for the Metric.
      B setDescription​(String description)
      Sets the description of the Metric.
      B setLabelKeys​(List<LabelKey> labelKeys)
      Sets the list of label keys for the Metric.
      B setUnit​(String unit)
      Sets the unit of the Metric.

        Sets the description of the Metric.

        Default value is "".

        Returns:

      • setUnit

        B setUnit​(String unit)
        Sets the unit of the Metric.

        Default value is "1".

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • setLabelKeys

        B setLabelKeys​(List<LabelKey> labelKeys)
        Sets the list of label keys for the Metric.

        Default value is Collections.emptyList()

        Parameters:
        labelKeys - the list of label keys for the Metric.
        Returns:
        this.

      • setConstantLabels

        B setConstantLabels​(Map<LabelKey,LabelValue> constantLabels)
        Sets the map of constant labels (they will be added to all the TimeSeries) for the Metric.

        Default value is Collections.emptyMap().

        Parameters:
        constantLabels - the map of constant labels for the Metric.
        Returns:
        this.

      • build

        V build()
        Builds and returns a metric with the desired options.
        Returns:
        a metric with the desired options.
